title: Launcher Update
content: Updated Mods Sections with selection of mods, New Section in settings tab, added new info button in mods section at mods tab

title: Launcher Update
content: Added More info in account section in settings, Fixed Sidebar, Moved Username and PlayerHead at the nav bar

title: MC/Launcher Update
content: New MendoraCore initializer,New Management Server API at https://manage.mendora.qzz.io,Added Discord RPC , Fixed Cracked not launching, Added Skin Support For Cracked, New Info Account Section in Settings, Updated Buttons on Servers Page, Added New Font Doto to all pages sections, Added New Mendora Core Mod, Updated Partners Sections, Fixed Bug where launching mc says you must login with ur microsoft account,

title: Launcher Update
content: Bug fix where cracked login is logging in with the name Player instead of the input username, Few UI Changes, Added new option in settings (width,height)
